text.original_text: Guide Finn through Lemongrab's dungeon freeing any captured Lemon people you find along the way.
text.en: Guide Finn through Lemongrab's dungeon freeing any captured Lemon People you come across.

text.original_text: You did it!
text.en: You did it!

text.original_text: You've freed the Lemon People and put the squeeze on Lemongrab.
text.en: You've freed the Lemon People and put the squeeze on Lemongrab.

text.original_text: Game Over
text.en: Game Over

text.original_text: Don't give up!
text.en: Don't give up!

text.original_text: Hang on to your lemons.
text.en: Hang on to your lemons.

text.original_text: Level Complete
text.en: Level Complete

text.original_text: Time Bonus:
text.en: Time Bonus:

text.original_text: Lemon Bonus:
text.en: Lemon Bonus:

text.original_text: Level Score:
text.en: Level Score:

text.original_text: Try to beat the level without getting hit
text.en: Try to beat the level without getting hit

text.original_text: Try to collect all the lemons
text.en: Try to collect all the lemons

text.original_text: Try to defeat all the enemies
text.en: Try to defeat all the enemies

text.original_text: Try to rescue all the lemon people
text.en: Try to rescue all the lemon people

text.original_text: Perfect!
text.en: Perfect!

text.original_text: I can press [down arrow] on ropes to drop down.
text.en: I can press [down arrow] on ropes to drop down.

text.original_text: I can jump higher if you hold down the jump key.
text.en: I can jump higher if you hold down the jump key.

text.original_text: I better free these sad Lemon peeps.
text.en: I better free these sad Lemon peeps.

text.original_text: This big ol’ door must be the exit.
text.en: This big ol’ door must be the exit.

text.original_text: I'll have to duck and crawl to get through here.
text.en: I'll have to duck and crawl to get through here.

text.original_text: Jump on Lemongrab's head to defeat him.
text.en: Jump on Lemongrab's head to defeat him.

text.original_text: Fireballs can blast through walls. [space]
text.en: Fireballs can blast through walls. [space]

text.original_text: I wonder what this switch does?
text.en: I wonder what this switch does?

text.original_text: Eat fireballs, Lemongrab!
text.en: Eat fireballs, Lemongrab!

text.original_text: I'll double jump my way to those lemons!
text.en: I'll double jump my way to those lemons!

text.original_text: Gah! Gotta crawl through this tunnel.
text.en: Gah! Gotta crawl through this tunnel.

text.original_text: Imma have to double jump it!
text.en: Imma have to double jump it!

text.original_text: If I throw pies at the spiderlings, I can use them as platforms.
text.en: If I throw pies at the spiderlings, I can use them as platforms.

text.original_text: Uh-oh, ghosts! I can't beat ghosts! I'll just have to avoid them.
text.en: Uh-oh, ghosts! I can't beat ghosts! I'll just have to avoid them.

text.original_text: Spider bites! I'll have to hit it with that cannon.
text.en: Spider bites! I'll have to hit it with that cannon.

text.original_text: Prepare for a hot slice of justice. It's Pie Time!
text.en: Prepare for a hot slice of justice. It\'s Pie Time!

text.original_text: Thanks for Saving Me!
text.en: Thanks for Saving Me!

text.original_text: How's about I give yous a little firepower? Press the "SPACE" key to throw fireballs.
text.en: How's about I give yous a little firepower? Press the "SPACE" key to throw fireballs.

text.original_text: Finn! You Saved My Bits
text.en: Finn! You Saved My Bits

text.original_text: I will give you the power to Double Jump. Just press jump again when you're in the air.
text.en: I will give you the power to Double Jump. Just press jump again when you're in the air.

text.original_text: You Saved Me from that Awful Lemon!
text.en: You Saved Me from that Awful Lemon!

text.original_text: Hop on my back and I’ll carry you for a while.
text.en: Hop on my back and I’ll carry you for a while.

text.original_text: You Rescued Me, Creator!
text.en: You Rescued Me, Creator!

text.original_text: That must mean you truly do love me! Here, these pies will help you stun your enemies.
text.en: That must mean you truly do love me! Here, these pies will help you stun your enemies.

text.original_text: Huh? What?
text.en: Huh? What?

text.original_text: Oh, you saved me. I guess we should escape Lemongrab's dungeon. Follow me...
text.en: Oh, you saved me. I guess we should escape Lemongrab's dungeon. Follow me...
